title: (SERIOUS) zen esports LF top + sup (SERIOUS)
body:
requiremts:

professional attitude
working mic + skype
punctual
gold 5 solo queue/diamond 5 ranked teams (minimum)

replies.body: Guys don't join this team this guy is a horrific owner/captain. he is a gold 5 trying to recruit diamond + players to play in his team (and no he isn't managing he is looking to play jungle) he gave me 30 minutes notice before trials was meant to be and i couldn't make it so without another word he removed me from everything and i haven't heard anything from him. if you want to be fucked around and not enjoy playing league then join this guy otherwise i suggest you steer far away from this guy and all of his toxicity.
I'm keen to try out a few games. Plat III support main.

hai am super serious serious playar i have a serious renk in am serious server of serious wil b seriously ov da serious playa 4 ur serious serious team serious

seriously doe serious ty and pls accept serious me's serious application bcuz am serious seriously
